website_summaries.verdict: A good option for complex HVAC setups such as heat pump, furnace and humidifier-dehumidifier configurations, this older ecobee is a reliable workhorse in the smart thermostat world.
pros: Owners like the level of control and customization they can get with this thermostat
Super-detailed reporting is a plus for many users
Many users prefer controlling through the website rather than the mobile app
cons: Installation can be complex, and so can online connection options
Interface looks old-fashioned, and touchscreen can be finicky
Some owners report compatibility issues with their HVAC units
Reports of thermostat “hunting” for correct temperature and sensor inaccuracies

customer_reviews.title: Great connected thermostat system
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a second unit to control the zone for the 2nd floor in our home. The web and app interfaces work great to monitor our sytem settings and remotely control our home HVAC system, even when away from the house. Forgot to shut off the A/C now that the outside temperature has dropped, or want to check if the kids have been messing with the thermostat settings - no problem! The ecobee for the first floor was already installed when we moved in, and I decided to stay with ecobee because I liked the interface and thought I would keep the controls consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Karl N.

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: After a recommendation from our heating and air company I purchased the Ecobee. We've had it installed 6 months and love it. I felt like I was always messing with my thermostat to get the temp up or down for comfort and now I never have to, which I am a bit sad about because the unit is so nice to use! The app is user friendly and was a requirement when I made the purchase. We've had a new roof and new windows installed so I can't attest to how much money it has possibly save, but our bills have gone down drastically.
customer_reviews.author: Mandamay

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, but...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked all the features but when I went to install in my unit, I was going to have to cut and splice every wire in the air handler to make it work. My air handler is over 10 years old and didn't have a circuit board and connectors like some of the installation videos on YouTube. It may have been too old to be easily compatible. I am mechanically inclined and could have fairly easily installed the unit with the provided instructions. Just decided to send it back and get a different one that was easier to install. Product really looked top notch and I really liked all the features.
customer_reviews.author: will d

customer_reviews.title: great product along with the board that allows several temp ...
customer_reviews.text: great product along with the board that allows several temp sensors. But Ecobee dumped this and any advancements in software just after I bought it. The new replace system they came out with will not work for me. I have 4 stages of heat and 2 cool along with requirements for external temp gauge (heat pump) . Also have sensors in use to average temps between 2 rooms, along with data logging duct temps.
customer_reviews.author: CompassWill

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermostat!
customer_reviews.text: The Ecobee is just what I needed at a lake house as I can connect to it anywhere, confirm connectivity, check status and adjust settings. No more walking into cold or hot place and needing a couple of hours to adjust. (Conversely, less heating and cooling an empty house, which saves $$.) The installation required some over-the-phone help from a professional, so I'd recommend arranging this in advance or hiring someone to do the installation. Settings are intuitive, adjustments couldn't be much simpler and the vacation setting is great. I highly recommend this thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Jberto

customer_reviews.title: Easy, effective, and a joy to have.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this now for 6 months. It works great. I go on vacation, and I can check up on the house, leave the program in vacation mode, and much more. I installed it myself, and not that difficult. I now have a humidifier hooked up with it, which is awesome to be able to control all the HVAC from one unit. Yes, it has saved me on heating and cooling bills.
customer_reviews.author: Fig Wriggly

customer_reviews.title: Working great.  Already notice a difference in utility bill.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my multi-zone system. Now, I have better control over how separate parts of my home are heated & cooled. Most difficult part was finding someone capable, willing & experienced in working with smart thermostats who would invest the time to get it right. The two installation providers on ecobee's website that I contacted did not respond, so to me it looks like they need a better list of authorized installers, but I was able to find someone. Happy too that my last 2 month's utility charges have been less that prior months and much less than prior year's charges by 11% (all I can attribute this to is the ecobee.)
customer_reviews.author: Clay Boswell

customer_reviews.title: ... now for 3 years and the thermostat works really good I like the way I can control my humidifier ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thermostat now for 3 years and the thermostat works really good I like the way I can control my humidifier from the thermostat customer service is also good but there's also a long wait and they are not 24 hours like the nest, but I think this thermostat has better functions than the nest
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Ecobee is a Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Not an easy install for an average home owner, this is an advanced product that is hands down the best thermostat I've owned. I did install this myself, and it took me a couple of hours for 2. I am Highly technical and very handy, and recommend an installer for most people. Programming is amazingly easy, and the vacation and quick save mode are fantastic from on the go with your smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: ev150us

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have three Ecobee's at three different locations. They work perfectly. I can make tempriture modifications on any of them from anywhere. They let me know if there is a problem with my heating and air, and I can tell if there is a power outage. They are extremely easy to operate. I have tried other thermostats and none hold a candle to the Ecobee. I have called the company for assistance, they are a pleasure to deal with. They can make remote updates and changes for you. If you are in to the statistics of the operation of your equipment it's all there. Ecobee is the only system I would ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Policar

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the next generation will be better. Doesn't learn like the Nest but is much more widely compatible.
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, I love the features and the app. However, the touch screen is not properly responsive and turning off the heat at the wall sometimes requires a dozen taps in various areas and at different pressures. This is far less than ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Saint Mary

customer_reviews.title: I really like this thermostat but now that the Ecobee 3 is ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thermostat but now that the Ecobee 3 is out it seems like Ecobee is letting this thermostat languish.
customer_reviews.author: omaha1280

customer_reviews.title: Great high end stat.
customer_reviews.text: Great stat have one of these and one of the smaller ones. Been using them for about 2 years with few problems. They have computer control and app control software. Not for the basic homeowner unless you do your homework first. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great. BE aware that you'll install the thermostat - but then there's another box that needs to be installed near the burner/boiler. This unit is required and goes between the burner and the thermostat. The unit is great. you'll need a wireless network in your house to use it however.
customer_reviews.author: TonyMo

customer_reviews.title: REQUIRES PROFESSIONAL INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: You will need a professional to install this product. I have a 5 heating and cooling zones and wanted to be able to control my systems remotely. The ecobee works perfect and offers lots of extras. I would recommend this product over the more stylist NEST product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E

customer_reviews.title: Thermostat has worked great with lots of info in web portal on usage
customer_reviews.text: Thermostat has worked great with lots of info in web portal on usage. Recently replaced entire HVAC system with no issue connecting to new system as well (Tech connected). I wouldn't suggest attempting on own unless very familiar with type of work (personal opinion). Mobil access and vacation programming is excellent, definitely helps in the energy department.
customer_reviews.author: Scandal929

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This t-stat is a great t-stat compared to the others on the market.I will say the set up is easy and it works great.On the other hand I was dissapointed to see no fastening screws for the tstat nor the interface module. and the instructions are not really easy to understand on wiring the accesssories. You need to have a hvac contractor install this if you are not sure what type of system you have,and how it works it will save you a headache. Overall I would take this over honeywell any day it took me about an hour and a half to install.
customer_reviews.author: randy brown

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my FOURTH ecobee! I LOVE THEM! I am able to control all of my HVAC with the furthest one being 2,200 miles away. I have save A LOT OF MONEY with my ecobees!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ECJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Very good thermostat, nice phone app to control it from away.
customer_reviews.author: Sloegin

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: It gives you the weather, it lets you program complicated schedules, you can change the temp in real-time from your phone or computer. Note that it does not come with a power cord for the control unit, it expects that you know how (or will hire someone who knows how) to hook up directly to 24VAC/3VA power source from furnace. You can buy the power cord separately if you'd rather go that route.
customer_reviews.author: S Feeney

customer_reviews.title: Has potential but not easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to install unfortunately, but perhaps that isn't their fault. Product has great potential but I will be selling mine and get a Nest instead.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: Ecobee has a place in our homes!
customer_reviews.text: Ecobee products ROCK! We have them in four locations and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Cleon Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Great Energy Saving Device.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea! Seems to work well. Terrific way to save energy when you are away from home. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: rodger

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! i can now control and program my thermostat from anywhere in the world. works as described. I just wonder if Ecobee goes out of business... will I still be able to control it since all communications go through their servers.
customer_reviews.author: R. Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: One of my best buys ever. This produce has made life so much better by having the ability to adjust the AC or heat on from afar
customer_reviews.author: John Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Show this off
customer_reviews.text: Was installed by someone who knows AC, but even when he ran into trouble, he contacted Ecobee, and they guided him thru the installation. I set my hours and temperatures through my computer and adjust comfort levels with my iphone. The unit is aesthetically pleasing. Yes, it's expensive but cool toys are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Best thermostat around
customer_reviews.text: I put this thermostat in one of my customers homes. They love it. With a WiFi network already in the house they can set there thermostat anywhere their smart phone works. They can change programming or monitor the temperature. Great device.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone S. Powers

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: If you ever wanted to control your hvac when you are not at home, this is a great tool. When I moved, I removed it from my old house and took it with me. I have an upstairs unit as well as a down stairs unit. I mounted this thermostat upstairs so I wouldn't have to always go upstairs just to adjust the temperature. Now my wife wants me to buy a second so we can have one downstairs and be able to make adjustments while we are out.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for this kind of thermostat for a while. Now I have it ! It works perfectly. If you are looking for best remote controlled thermostat for your home this is the product you will love.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget
customer_reviews.text: Great device for those who want complete control over their HVAC systems. Easy installation even for a novice. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Works as said it would . Did not expect installation would be as involved as it was, but had an hvac person install.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good thermostat. Recommended. A few nits/requests
customer_reviews.text: Good tstat. The web interface is slick and I imagine folks with multiple zones will benefit even more. I was going to do the install but was a bit overwhelmed by the furnace hookup. If you are handy you can figure it out. I recommend this tstat and ecobees customer service is really good. Few requests. The web portal should be built into the device in case ecobee.co goes down or if the company goes belly up.
customer_reviews.author: Yamil Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Got rid of the 3 different boxes I had on my wall. Love the fact I can set the temp from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: sledhead1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to control the large zones in my church building (auditorium, fellowship hall). They do an excellent job, especially with the smart recovery (what used to be called optimal start/stop). Wireless connectivity makes things easy
customer_reviews.author: James Mort

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Using all features - rsm and smart plugs. Super easy to set up and use. Adding more smart plugs soon. Web site works well and connection to router is simple.
customer_reviews.author: Waywest

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: To connect the power without a 120V power adapter just jumper the hot wire (the R/red one) to one of the power terminals and route the common wire there as well. Everything else should be pretty self explainatory.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot express how happy I am with this thermostat, it works flawlessly and is very easy to use. I'd recommened this to anyone looking for a internet ready thermostat. Looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Master Batter

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Can turn on or off nad adjust temp from my phone or any computer. Can also see how long both air and heat have run at any given point.
customer_reviews.author: john Hornbeak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product was returned due to compatibility with my HVAC
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jones

customer_reviews.title: jka
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived quickly and was just as advertized. I can recommend both the product and the seller. It has greatly improved our general comfort. Do wish the screen was slightly larger.

customer_reviews.title: New EcoBee
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and Set-up, Online web tool is excellent. Would recomend to anyone that wants an easy to set-up web controlable Thermostat.

customer_reviews.title: Claims untrue
customer_reviews.text: Not easily installed as claimed. Needs to be hard-wired by a professional. This item was returned because it was misrepresented.

customer_reviews.text: that device is crazy it does what ever it want, I set it on 75 it goes by it self on 69, I set it on 78 and it does the same...I have it for 3 years and all that time I try unsuccessfully to make it work properly .DON'T BUY IT!!!!!!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a great item
customer_reviews.text: Pure junk. Spent 2 hours figuring out how to hook this up and when I finally got it running, the home screen was frozen. Spoke to people at Ecobee and they wouldn't send a replacement. I had to pack it up and send it back to Amazon at my cost. Looks like a great item, but poor quality product. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Krown

customer_reviews.title: Ecobee app will not work with IOS 6
customer_reviews.text: Thermostat works great. Installation and configuration was straight forward. Ability to program, control and monitor over the internet is fabulous. However their app will not work on my iPhone after upgrading to IOS 6 . Company says they are working on a fix. Do not buy if the ability to control this thermostat with an apple product is important to you or until they fix the problem
customer_reviews.author: dave5316

Gas, Oil, Electric, Boiler, and Heat Pump Compatible. 365 Day Scheduling, 7-Day Programmable, Vacation Programming. Humidifier, dehumidifier and ventilator control. Free Smartphone / Tablet App. Downloadable System Reports.

AMAZON.COM


The ecobee Smart Thermostat (view larger).


The ecobee Smart thermostat:
the easiest way to control your home comfort — even when you're not home.


SMART. REALLY, REALLY SMART.
ecobee works behind the scenes to understand how your home uses energy, and then finds ways to save without compromising your comfort. And with 50 percent of your home's energy use coming from heating and cooling, it means a lower energy bill for you. So now you can feel good about having a really comfortable home, no matter what it's like outside.

COMFORT AND SAVINGS FROM DAY ONE
ecobee immediately optimizes your energy use so you can save comfortably. Homeowners saved an average of 24 percent on heating and 21 percent on cooling annually. 

(Compared to leaving the thermostat on hold at 72 degrees F) 

HOME IQ ENERGY REPORT
Home IQ is a free personalized monthly report that shows your energy usage and savings. This helps you better understand how your monthly temperature settings and the weather outside impacts your energy bill.



Monthly report (view larger).






ECOBEE RATING
ecobee monitors your home's energy performance and rates its overall efficiency. A low score means energy efficient upgrades are recommended, while a high score means you can be confident your home is performing well. 

ecobee also tracks more detailed information on equipment performance which can be helpful when troubleshooting system problems when they arise. 



CONTROL FROM YOUR SMARTPHONE
You can connect to your ecobee thermostat anytime, anywhere using your smart phone, tablet, or desktop to control your settings, see your savings, and check that everything is working fine.

Download the free ecobee app for your Android, Blackberry, or iPhone.






Control your ecobee remotely from your smartphone (view larger).

MAKE A MEANINGFUL DIFFERENCE TO THE ENVIRONMENT 




ecobee makes it easy to manage the energy efficiency of your home — an important contribution towards a healthier world around us.
